CAT3DAnnotationLevelSelectorHdr.Title: 層級選擇器
CAT3DAnnotationHideHdr.Title: 隱藏
CAT3DAnnotationHideHdr.ShortHelp: 隱藏所選註記或與所選物件相關聯的註記。
CAT3DAnnotationShowHdr.Title: 顯示
CAT3DAnnotationShowHdr.ShortHelp: 顯示所選註記或與所選物件相關聯的註記。
CAT3DAnnotationSetHideHdr.Title: 隱藏註記集
CAT3DAnnotationSetShowHdr.Title: 顯示註記集
CAT3DAnnotationBrowserHdr.Title: 3D 註記
CAT3DAnnotationBrowserHdr.ShortHelp: 在<wintitle>視圖與擷取</wintitle>面板中顯示 視圖縮圖和擷取
CAT3DAnnotationBrowserHdr.LongHelp: 選擇視圖縮圖或擷取畫面以將其啟用。
OpenAttrBrowser.Title: 3D Annotations
OpenAttrBrowser.ShortHelp: Displays the thumbnails of views and captures in the <wintitle>Views and Captures</wintitle> panel.
OpenAttrBrowser.LongHelp: Select the thumbnail of a view or a capture to activate it.
CloseAttrBrowser.Title: 3D Annotations
CloseAttrBrowser.ShortHelp: Displays the thumbnails of views and captures in the <wintitle>Views and Captures</wintitle> panel.
CloseAttrBrowser.LongHelp: Select the thumbnail of a view or a capture to activate it.
CAT3DAnnotationSwitchOnOffHdr.Title: 顯示註記集
AnnotationSwitchOn.Title: Display Annotation Sets
CAT3DAnnotationSwitchOffHdr.Title: Display Annotation Sets
CAT3DAnnotationBlankingHdr.Title: 註記留白
CAT3DAnnotationBlankingHdr.ShortHelp: 當留白模式屬性為「填滿區域」或「以幾何填滿區域」時， 將留白套用至註記
SetBlanking.Title: Annotation Blanking
SetBlanking.ShortHelp: Applies blanking to annotations when blanking mode property is 'Area Fill' or 'Area Fill with Geometry'
ResetBlanking.Title: Annotation Blanking
ResetBlanking.ShortHelp: Applies blanking to annotations when blanking mode property is 'Area Fill' or 'Area Fill with Geometry'
CAT3DAnnotShowAttrRelatedInfosHdr.Title: 顯示特徵額外資訊
CAT3DAnnotShowAttrRelatedInfosHdr.ShortH: 顯示所選特徵的額外資訊。
ShowAttrRelatedInfos.Title: Show feature additional information
ShowAttrRelatedInfos.ShortHelp: Display additional information of the selected features.
HideAttrRelatedInfos.Title: Show feature additional information
HideAttrRelatedInfos.ShortHelp: Display additional information of the selected features.
